code: import axios from'axios';import api from'./api';const API_URL='http://localhost:5000/api/auth';export const register=async userData=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/register`,userData);return response.data;};export const login=async credentials=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/login`,credentials);return response.data;};export const checkAuth=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/auth/check');return response.data;};export const logout=async()=>{const response=await api.post('/auth/logout');localStorage.removeItem('token');return response;};
